analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x2c517ca8a224fc0aa64b824e935658211f832e14.sol:
	Contract Cordbank has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c517ca8a224fc0aa64b824e935658211f832e14.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x2c517ca8a224fc0aa64b824e935658211f832e14.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c517ca8a224fc0aa64b824e935658211f832e14.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c517ca8a224fc0aa64b824e935658211f832e14.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
